Jekyll folder structure

Create a jekyll site structure from a packageâ€™s roxygen. Optionally, a site may be built, too. Building your site requires jekyll to be installed and available on your system.

path

A file path specifying the folder of a package, defaults to ".".

dir

A file path, relative to path, specifying the destination of the jekyll folders and files, defaults to "docs/".

build

One of TRUE or FALSE specifying if the jekyll site is built after creating the folder structure, defaults to FALSE.

config

A file path specifying a config file to overwrite build parameters, defaults to NULL. See here for information about jekyll config paramters.
